bug.author: AND2797
bug.description:
The link to the <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/datasets/catalog/emnist>EMNIST page</denchmark-link> on Tensorflow's docs is broken. The existing link is - <denchmark-link:https://www.nist.gov/node/1298471/emnist-dataset>https://www.nist.gov/node/1298471/emnist-dataset</denchmark-link>
It should be replaced by - <denchmark-link:http://www.itl.nist.gov/iaui/vip/cs_links/EMNIST/gzip.zip>http://www.itl.nist.gov/iaui/vip/cs_links/EMNIST/gzip.zip</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Interested to fix this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797>@AND2797</denchmark-link> . Do all the mentions of the link are required to be changed to <denchmark-link:http://www.itl.nist.gov/iaui/vip/cs_links/EMNIST/gzip.zip>http://www.itl.nist.gov/iaui/vip/cs_links/EMNIST/gzip.zip</denchmark-link> as some refer to the homepage rather than the dataset itself. Can <denchmark-link:https://www.nist.gov/itl/products-and-services/emnist-dataset>https://www.nist.gov/itl/products-and-services/emnist-dataset</denchmark-link> be used except for the first occurrence?

Actually, good point. I assumed that the link led to the download of the actual dataset. Now since the link is broken I am not sure if it led to the download of the actual data set or the home page of the dataset. Perhaps one could add both, or either one.
Additionally, I don't think this page of documentation is based on any file in this repository. Any opinions on this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797>@AND2797</denchmark-link> ?

Additionally, I don't think this page of documentation is based on any file in this repository. Any opinions on this @AND2797 ?
do you mean based on any module source code?

Yes <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797>@AND2797</denchmark-link> . The source code behind that page of documentation at <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/datasets/catalog/emnist>EMNIST PAGE</denchmark-link> .
Not sure what you mean, but I have already created a pull request with the changes, I will close this thread if it is approved.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797>@AND2797</denchmark-link> , Can you add PR link here. Thanks!

@AND2797, Can you add PR link here. Thanks!
Do you mean this -> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797/datasets/pull/1>AND2797/datasets#1</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/AND2797>@AND2797</denchmark-link> , Can you submit this PR against Tensorflow?
I've submitted the PR against tensorflow, can anyone take a look?
Fix will go out shortly. Thank you!
